patterns: Give me some information about IIT Guwahati
responses: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati (IIT Guwahati) is a public technical and research university established by the Government of India in 1994, located in Guwahati, Assam.
I am a chatbot.

patterns: Tell me about the programs available at IIT Guwahati
responses: IIT Guwahati offers a variety of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs in engineering, science, design, and humanities. These include B.Tech, M.Tech, M.Sc, M.Des, and Ph.D. programs.

patterns: when should i come to college
responses: College is open 8am-5pm Monday-Friday!

patterns: Can i get your phone number
responses: You can contact IIT Guwahati via email at registrar@iitg.ac.in or by phone at +91-361-2583000. The campus is located at Amingaon, Guwahati, Assam, India - 781039.

patterns: what are the courses offered in your college?
Tell me about the department at IIT Guwahati
List of departments at IIT Guwahati
responses: IIT Guwahati has several departments including Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Biosciences and Bioengineering, and many more. To know more about them visit https://iitg.ac.in/acad/admission/bachelor/disciplines.php
Could you please specify your question about IIT Guwahati? I'm here to help with any specific information you need.

patterns: Tell me about the history of IIT Guwahati
responses: IIT Guwahati was established in 1994 by an act of parliament. It is the sixth member of the IIT fraternity and was set up with the mission to provide high-quality education and conduct advanced research in various fields of technology.

patterns: What is campus life like at IIT Guwahati?
Tell me about the campus life at IIT Guwahati
responses: Campus life at IIT Guwahati is vibrant and diverse with numerous clubs, societies, and events. The institute has excellent infrastructure, including hostels, sports facilities, a central library, and various cultural and technical fests.

patterns: what is the address of college
responses: IIT Guwahati is located in Amingaon, Guwahati, Assam, India. The campus is situated on the north bank of the Brahmaputra River, offering a scenic and serene environment. To know the location visit https://www.google.com/maps/place/IIT+Guwahati+Main+Gate/@26.1958358,91.6753885,15z/data=!4m10!1m2!2m1!1siitg+location!3m6!1s0x375a5b8e4496ac57:0x734587e7496393a1!8m2!3d26.1961628!4d91.6874578!15sCg1paXRnIGxvY2F0aW9ukgEDaXV04AEA!16s%2Fg%2F11stqg533p?entry=ttu

patterns: how far is hostel from college
responses: IIT Guwahati provides on-campus hostel facilities for students. The hostels are well-equipped with modern amenities, including internet access, common rooms, recreational areas, and mess facilities. For hostel details visit https://iitg.ac.in/freshers/?p=hostels

patterns: What research facilities are available at IIT Guwahati?
Tell me about research at IIT Guwahati
responses: IIT Guwahati is known for its cutting-edge research facilities and active research environment. The institute has advanced laboratories and research centers in various fields of science and technology. Students and faculty are involved in numerous research projects funded by national and international agencies. To know more visit https://www.iitg.ac.in/rnd

patterns: list of events organised in college
list of events conducted in college
What events are conducted in college
Are there any event held at college
responses: IIT Guwahati hosts several cultural and technical events throughout the year. Major events include Alcheringa (cultural festival), Techniche (techno-management festival), and Research Conclave. These events attract participants from all over the country and provide a platform for students to showcase their talents. For event details visit https://www.iitg.ac.in/iitg_events_all
Visit https://iitg.ac.in/acad/CourseStructure/Btech2018/btech.php for more info

patterns: What facilities are available at IIT Guwahati?
Tell me about the facilities at IIT Guwahati
responses: IIT Guwahati boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including advanced research labs, a modern library, sports complexes, health services, student hostels, and Wi-Fi enabled campus.

patterns: does the college have library facility
responses: There is a central library. For more information, visit https://www.iitg.ac.in/lib

IIT Guwahati has a robust placement cell that facilitates job placements for students. Top companies from various sectors, including technology, finance, consulting, and core engineering, visit the campus for recruitment. The placement statistics are impressive, with many students securing high-paying jobs. To know about placements, visit https://iitg.ac.in/ccd
Here is the Academic Calendar https://iitg.ac.in/acad/academic_calendar.php

patterns: what is the process of admission
How to take admission in your college
What is the process for admission
responses: Admissions to IIT Guwahati for undergraduate programs are based on JEE Advanced scores. For postgraduate programs, admissions are through GATE, JAM, CEED, and other relevant exams. To know more about admission, visit https://www.iitg.ac.in/acad/admission
